channel.title: I need a small favor. Rep++

item.title: I need a small favor. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @DCScape DCScape
item.description:
@DCScape wrote:

Ok, well, to make a long story short, I need pickup with a Buffered Writer included.

Here is my pickup command:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 10 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“S00nerfan”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Head Shot08”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You typed it wrong. ;)");
        }
    }[/code]

Now, If someone could just make it so there’s a file writer below it, I’ll rep you. Please whoever helps, make it so it says, Playername spawned ITEM ID.

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a small favor. Rep++
